Name: BoidWatch
About the game: Soar alongside these majestic cones, or modify them to act as you see fit. You can create and destroy members of a complex simulation, or just enjoy the magic of flight. Wand - Direct the flock to travel wherever you command. Boid Spawner - Use the sliders to customize the different behavioral parameters of each Boid. Gun - Introduce Boids to a fiery and explosive demise. Mind Control - attach yourself to a member of the flock, and command it to swoop by pointing where you want them to go and pulling the trigger.
Meta Title: BoidWatch: Sep 1, 2017, Emmett Baber and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on BoidWatch? Check out the release date (Sep 1, 2017), developer insights from Emmett Baber, and a complete game summary.
